name: Bluefront Capital
overview:
Bluefront Capital is a corporate financial advisory firm serving fast growing companies through all stages of their corporate life cycle from venture stage to middle market. We develop long-term relationships with our clients and provide continuous support at every facet of business development from finding the right financial partners and identifying achievement-oriented executives, to managing national and cross-border M&A transactions.

Bluefront Capital aims to services three distinct parts of the business ecosystem which are:

  1. Companies in need of financial advisory, business development and strategic help.
  2. Traditional Money Managers, Hedge Funds, Funds of Hedge Funds and other Asset Allocators in need of operational and risk management support.
  3. Large public companies who wish to allocate to alternative investments and / or buy small companies in order to expand their product / service offerings.
